PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1993-07101993-04-020,  ,  ,  EIC, 
PrecisApproval of amendments to the UNEMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS which will permit the Chairperson of the Board of Referees, at the request of either the claimant or employer, to exclude the claimant, the employer, either's representatives or any other witness when oral evidence is being given in a hearing involving alleged sexual harassment or other form of harassment.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1993-0176 Publication Date: 1993-04-21
Attachments
